item.title: Optimation Decision Making
item.description: Total LEARNING OBJECTIVES: Define decision model and describe the importance of such models. Understand the two types of decision models: deterministic and probabilistic models. Understand the steps involved in developing decision models in practical situations. Understand the use of spreadsheets in developing decision models. Understand the basic assumptions and properties of linear programming (LP). Use graphical procedures to solve LP problems with only two variables to understand how LP problems are solved.
